channel.title: Open with using mac
channel.description: What should i be using to do all my codes and stuff? I am a mac user and i am not sure whether to use a textedit or terminal etcc. what to use?

item.title: Open with using mac
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Eclipse IDE and TextWrangler are my preferred. IDE’s are used for programming, and TextWrangler is a text editor that also has syntax highlighting and language support for quite a few languages.
TextWrangler is available on the App Store, and you will have to download Eclipse from the internet.

Read full topic

item.title: Open with using mac
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:5, topic:518873”][quote author=voetbal645 link=topic=637140.msg4295785#msg4295785 date=1368200460]
Use eclipse, you can run your server with it and program with it.
A good program for a mac.
[/quote]
This. I use a macbook pro and eclipse is awesome, not just for macs, but for windows computers too.
Ye i know, but he’s a mac user so in my opinion it’s the best program that he can use for it.[/quote]

Read full topic
